  • Uses of PolicyManager in core.application

    Methods in core.application with parameters of type PolicyManager
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    Controller.setPolicyManager(PolicyManager policyManager)
    Sets the PolicyManager for the Controller, affecting the invocation policy for registered actions.

  • Uses of PolicyManager in policymanager

    Classes in policymanager that implement PolicyManager
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    BigGroup
    Implementation of the PolicyManager interface that distributes invocations in groups that may vary in size among invokers.
    class 
    GreedyGroup
     
    class 
    RoundRobin
    A simple implementation of the Round Robin policy for selecting invokers from a list.
    class 
    UniformGroup
    Implementation of the PolicyManager interface that distributes invocations uniformly among invokers.

    Creates a new instance of the RoundRobin policy manager.
